name: Fiberly - #BuildInPublic Project
description:
Fiberly helps people discover and prepare whole plant-based meals, and realize the impact a rich nutrition can have in their health and the world.


This is a #BuildInPublic project, meaning that I've committed to share my progress updates! And that includes making this design open source.


This release contains major updates to Fiberly's user experience and a fresh new prototype. You can learn more about what's coming next on my public Fiberly Notion site.


If you want to be in the loop of future updates, follow Fiberly on Twitter üê§

  • Added a new prototype that covers the essential user experience flows

  • Logo design


Jan 15 2021

  • Explored some ideas around how to display nutritional value about food items
  • Added new screens to the prototype related to search and food item info


Jan 14 2021

  • List layout update (kudos to @joey for the remix base)
  • Micro-interactions to complete and remove items


Jan 13 2021

  • Basic sign up screens and list layout
